concept.title: Security Center
concept.shortdesc: All the security settings including firewall, service, port settings in TA1600/2400/3200 are displayed in security center. You can rapidly check and configure the relevant security settings here.

section.title: Firewall
section.p: In the Firewall tab, you can check firewall configuration and alert settings. By clicking the relevant button, you can enter the configuration page directly.

section.title: Service
section.p: In Service tab, you can check AMI/SSH status. For AMI/SSH, you can enter the according page by clicking the button in Setting column.

section.title: Port
section.p: In Port tab, you can check SIP port and HTTP port. You can also enter the relevant page by clicking the button in Setting column.
